sentence: The Republican National Committee voted on Friday to censure Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois, two outspoken critics of former President Donald Trump who are the only Republicans serving on the House select committee tasked with investigating the Jan. 6 Capitol riot.
author: Alex Nitzberg
title: Republican National Committee censures Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger, will 'immediately cease any and all support of them as members of the Republican Party'
